chunk_metadata.created_by: Enhanced Markdown Chunker with Comprehensive Context

works.Name: Ouverture C-Dur
works.Notes: Presumably composed 1832; premiered at a Sunday concert organized by Fanny Hensel with the Königsstädter Orchestra conducted by Lecerf; difficulty level 3
works.Long Description: A slow introduction followed by a “con fuoco” section featuring virtuosic string runs; described as “a colourful painting in opulent joy of playing” (The Times).
works.Short Description: Romantic overture in C major with slow introduction and fiery main section.
works.name of source: Musik für Orchester – Music for Orchestra

works.Name: Ouvertüre aus Isacco - Figura del Redentore
works.Notes: First publication; taken from the oratorio "Isacco – Figura del Redentore" composed 1781 to a libretto by Pietro Metastasio; difficulty level 3–4
works.Long Description: Overture to the 1781 oratorio "Isacco – Figura del Redentore"; structured Allegro maestoso – Andante – Allegro con spirito.
works.Short Description: Classical overture from Martines’s oratorio "Isacco – Figura del Redentore".
works.name of source: Musik für Orchester – Music for Orchestra

chunk_info.processing_notes: Two complete orchestral overtures by women composers extracted; both have full instrumentation, duration, and historical context.
